trans-unit.target: 破晓返生使

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your end step, choose a creature card in an opponent's graveyard, then that player chooses a creature card in your graveyard. You may return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield. (Those permanents return under their owners' control.)

Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 重置所有由你操控的生物和所有由目标对手操控的生物。直到回合结束，你与该对手分别操控由对方操控的所有生物。这些生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Repeal
trans-unit.target: 撤回

trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标总法术力费用为X的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."\n—Agosto, Azorius imperator
trans-unit.target: 「你的约定不能毁弃。但你，倒是可以。」～俄佐立将军阿果托

trans-unit.resname: C15·105 | Rite of Replication | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rite of Replication
trans-unit.target: 模造仪式

trans-unit.resname: C15·105 | Rite of Replication | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)\nPut a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target creature. If CARDNAME was kicked, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{5}（你可以在施放此咒语时额外支付{5}。）将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为目标生物之复制品。如果CARDNAME已增幅，则改为将五个此类衍生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Sleep
trans-unit.target: 眠梦咒

trans-unit.source: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 横置由目标牌手操控的所有生物。这些生物于该牌手的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."\n—Garild, merfolk mage
trans-unit.target: 「我给他们的幻梦奇妙无比，让他们舍不得回到清醒的世界。」～人鱼法师加俐得

trans-unit.source: Stolen Goods
trans-unit.target: 赃物

trans-unit.resname: C15·107 | Stolen Goods | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止。直到回合结束，你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C15·108 | Stroke of Genius | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stroke of Genius
trans-unit.target: 神来一笔

trans-unit.resname: C15·108 | Stroke of Genius | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓X张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C15·108 | Stroke of Genius | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.
trans-unit.target: 在一百多次实验失败后，克撒惊觉一般的银可以通过时光通道而不受伤害。于是他立刻设计了一个银魔像。

trans-unit.resname: C15·109 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talrand, Sky Summoner
trans-unit.target: 空召师陶岚

trans-unit.resname: C15·109 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，将一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C15·109 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
trans-unit.target: 「大海浩瀚，但天空更加无际。如果我能同时统治两者，又何必只安于其一？」

trans-unit.source: Thought Reflection
trans-unit.target: 心念映象

trans-unit.resname: C15·110 | Thought Reflection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将抓一张牌，则改为抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Knowledge fills the mind of a fool and opens the mind of the sage.
trans-unit.target: 知识盈满愚人的心灵，打开智者的心灵。

trans-unit.source: Windfall
trans-unit.target: 横财

trans-unit.source: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手弃掉手牌，然后各抓若干牌，其数量等同于牌手中以此法弃牌的最多数量。

trans-unit.source: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."\n—Barrin, master wizard
trans-unit.target: 「要在脑袋中装满知识，我们必须先把脑袋清干净。」～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.source: Altar's Reap
trans-unit.target: 祭坛夺命

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."\n—Gorghul, augur of skulls
trans-unit.target: 「别担心，我们会尽力从你的死亡取得大量情报。」～颅骨卜算师苟古

trans-unit.source: Ambition's Cost

trans-unit.source: The waters of wisdom are as dust in the mouth of one who thirsts for power.
trans-unit.target: 对渴求权力者而言，知识之水干涩如尘。

trans-unit.source: Ancient Craving
trans-unit.target: 远古渴望

trans-unit.source: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你抓三张牌且失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Knowledge demands sacrifice.
trans-unit.target: 要牺牲才能获取知识。

trans-unit.target: 鲜血交易

trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲两个生物。

trans-unit.resname: C15·115 | Barter in Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We must all make sacrifices for the good of Innistrad."\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: 「我们都必须为依尼翠的福祉作出牺牲。」～索霖马可夫

trans-unit.source: Black Market
trans-unit.target: 黑市

trans-unit.resname: C15·116 | Black Market | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。在你战斗前的行动阶段开始时，CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，便加{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Blood Bairn

trans-unit.source: The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road.

trans-unit.target: 马拉奇屠夫

trans-unit.resname: C15·118 | Butcher of Malakir | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
trans-unit.target: 他永远判定有罪。他总是裁决处死。

trans-unit.target: {3}{B}{B}，{T}，牺牲X个其他生物：将X张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。{5}{B}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Diabolic Servitude
trans-unit.target: 严酷苦役

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nWhen the creature put onto the battlefield with CARDNAME dies, exile it and return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, exile the creature put onto the battlefield with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。当以CARDNAME放进战场的生物死去时，将它放逐，并将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。当CARDNAME离开战场时，放逐以CARDNAME放进战场的生物。

trans-unit.target: 唤终巨人

trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever CARDNAME or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当CARDNAME或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Crippling fear precedes it. A foul stench accompanies it. Death follows in its wake.
trans-unit.target: 身前恐惧蔓延。身畔恶臭随行。身后尸横遍野。

trans-unit.source: Dreadbringer Lampads
trans-unit.target: 引怖冥灵

trans-unit.resname: C15·122 | Dreadbringer Lampads | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever CARDNAME or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当CARDNAME或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，目标生物获得威吓异能直到回合结束。（它只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: C15·123 | Eater of Hope | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 希望噬魔

trans-unit.resname: C15·123 | Eater of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate CARDNAME.{2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行{B}，牺牲另一个生物：重生CARDNAME。{2}{B}，牺牲两个其他生物：消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: C15·123 | Eater of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .
trans-unit.target: 神祗还能安抚。但是恶魔...

trans-unit.source: Extractor Demon
trans-unit.target: 榨取恶魔

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\nUnearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行每当另一个生物离开战场时，你可以令目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。破坟{2}{B}（{2}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Fallen Ideal
trans-unit.target: 堕落理念

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has flying and "Sacrifice a creature: This creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物具有飞行异能与「牺牲一个生物：此生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。」当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Fate Unraveler
trans-unit.target: 析命巫婆

trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Never forget that the life you've built can be undone by a single loose thread."\n—Perisophia the philosopher
trans-unit.target: 「永远别忘记，稍一不慎，你这趟生命就可能毁于一旦。」～哲人珀里索菲娅

trans-unit.source: Gild

trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Put a colorless artifact token named Gold onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。将一个名称为黄金的无色衍生神器放进战场。它具有「牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: Merchants of the Underworld trade in coins of clay. Gold serves another purpose.
trans-unit.target: 冥界商人使用黏土货币来做买卖。黄金另有用途。

trans-unit.source: Grave Peril
trans-unit.target: 涉险墓地

trans-unit.resname: C15·128 | Grave Peril | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When a nonblack creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, destroy that creature.
trans-unit.target: 当一个非黑色的生物进战场时，牺牲CARDNAME。若你如此作，则消灭该生物。

trans-unit.source: "Sometimes the grave does not wait for death before relishing its feast of flesh and bones."\n—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours
trans-unit.target: 「有时墓地等不及死亡到来，便开始品尝鲜肉与脆骨的大餐。」～黯刻德鲁伊易季司

trans-unit.source: Nighthowler
trans-unit.target: 夜嚎怪

trans-unit.source: Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)CARDNAME and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 神授{2}{B}{B}（如果你支付此牌的神授费用来施放它，则它便是具「结附于生物」的灵气咒语。如果它未结附于生物上，就会再度成为生物。）CARDNAME与所结附的生物各得+X/+X，X为所有坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Arena
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚斗技场

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.
trans-unit.target: 人性滴落力量汪洋。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Plaguelord
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚疫病王

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.\nSacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。牺牲一个生物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death."\n—Phyrexian progress notes
trans-unit.target: 「疾病的最后阶段：颤抖、痉挛和死亡。」～非瑞克西亚进展纪录

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Rager
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚狂怒兽

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「我相信许多世界都将臣服于非瑞克西亚。秘罗地只不过是第一个。」～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Reclamation
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚的矫治

trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，支付2点生命：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Death is no excuse to stop working.
trans-unit.target: 死亡不能作为停止工作的藉口。

trans-unit.resname: C15·134 | Rise from the Grave | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise from the Grave
trans-unit.target: 坟场复生

trans-unit.resname: C15·134 | Rise from the Grave | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。该生物额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。

trans-unit.resname: C15·134 | Rise from the Grave | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Death is no excuse for disobedience."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「死亡不是抗命的藉口。」～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.resname: C15·135 | Seal of Doom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seal of Doom

trans-unit.resname: C15·135 | Seal of Doom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标非黑色的生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: C15·135 | Seal of Doom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."\n—Szadek
trans-unit.target: 「蜥怪的逼视虽然有效，但处理残留物质却很费工夫。 这远比不上将受害者完全分解。」～札戴克

trans-unit.resname: C15·136 | Sever the Bloodline | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sever the Bloodline
trans-unit.target: 斩断血脉

trans-unit.resname: C15·136 | Sever the Bloodline | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.\nFlashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物和所有与该生物同名的其他生物。返照{5}{B}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Shriekmaw
trans-unit.target: 尖吼怪

trans-unit.source: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.\nEvoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 恐惧（此生物只能被神器生物和／或黑色生物阻挡。）当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。呼魂{1}{B}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）

trans-unit.source: Underworld Connections
trans-unit.target: 地底城系绊

trans-unit.resname: C15·138 | Underworld Connections | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 结附于地所结附的地具有「{T}，支付1点生命：抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.
trans-unit.target: 只要你要，就会有。问题是，你愿意付出多少代价。

trans-unit.source: Victimize
trans-unit.target: 生体活祭

trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选择的牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「去死吧。知道你这悲惨的一生能为我换回莫大回报，你也死得明白。」～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.source: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."
trans-unit.target: 「最大的树木也是从一颗小芽开始生长茂盛。愿你心中的种子也如这般硕果累累。」

trans-unit.source: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

trans-unit.source: "An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot. The sound is mundane, but inaudible vibrations scatter and sunder magical contrivances."\n—Simic research notes
trans-unit.target: 「巨犀兽的吼声破坏力比其足跺还强大。 其震耳巨响带有无法听闻的震动，能让法术器械四分五裂。」～析米克研究纪录

trans-unit.source: "They put bars on these noble beasts and then wonder why werewolves target our towns."

trans-unit.source: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.
trans-unit.target: 可思考与创造的身体引导着阴险的自然残存者；此先知正是析米克的具现。

trans-unit.source: Counterflux
trans-unit.target: 魔力断流

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities.\nCounter target spell you don't control.\nOverload {1}{U}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被咒语或异能反击。反击目标不由你操控的咒语。超载{1}{U}{U}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.source: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.
trans-unit.target: 板甲、胸膛的皮肤、胸廓、心脏～对抗能直触灵魂的法师时，这些都毫无用处。

trans-unit.source: Epic Experiment
trans-unit.target: 壮绝实验

trans-unit.resname: C15·216 | Epic Experiment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each instant and sorcery card with converted mana cost X or less among them, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。对其中每张总法术力费用等于或小于X的瞬间与法术牌而言，你可以施放该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。然后将所有以此法放逐且未施放的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Etherium-Horn Sorcerer

trans-unit.source: {1}{U}{R}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.\nCascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}{R}：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到你放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于牌库底。）

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用为3的瞬间牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。然后对总法术力费用为2和1的瞬间牌重复此流程。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{R}{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."\n—Agrus Kos
trans-unit.target: 「你有没有用手捧过波洛斯印记？ 这印记比外表看起来要沉重许多～因为它承载了厚实的力量与荣耀。」～阿固寇斯

trans-unit.source: Burnished Hart
trans-unit.target: 光洁雄鹿

trans-unit.resname: C15·248 | Burnished Hart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {3}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.
trans-unit.target: 由神明之手铸造，在凡人领域游荡。

trans-unit.source: Coldsteel Heart
trans-unit.target: 寒钢核心

trans-unit.resname: C15·249 | Coldsteel Heart | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nAs CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种颜色。{T}：加一点该色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚的杀戮机械已起动，其寒钢核心将活跃的恶毒力量灌注全身。

trans-unit.source: Crystal Chimes
trans-unit.target: 水晶钟铃

trans-unit.resname: C15·250 | Crystal Chimes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将所有结界牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.
trans-unit.target: 撒拉直到此时才知道，她和平而圣洁的国度竟像是玻璃般地脆弱。

trans-unit.source: Darksteel Ingot
trans-unit.target: 玄铁锭

trans-unit.source: Indestructible{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 不灭{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "It reflects the purity of Mirrodin-that-was."\n—Koth of the Hammer
trans-unit.target: 「它照映出过往秘罗地的纯洁。」～锤族的寇斯

trans-unit.source: Dreamstone Hedron

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{3}到你的法术力池中。{3}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.
trans-unit.target: 只有透过奥札奇心灵的歪曲思考路径，才能敲开晶石来汲取其间力量。

trans-unit.source: Eldrazi Monument

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1且具有飞行与不灭异能。在你的维持开始时，牺牲一个生物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Gods don't die. They merely slumber."\n—Ayli, Kamsa cleric
trans-unit.target: 「神明未死。他们只是睡着了。」～肯莎僧侣艾栗

trans-unit.source: Fellwar Stone

trans-unit.source: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?"\n—Mairsil, the Pretender
trans-unit.target: 「你有的东西，哪一样我得不到？」～伪装者梅西尔

trans-unit.source: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.
trans-unit.target: 这徽记的意义随你观点不同而变化：可能是足以自傲的自然循环护卫，也可能是向黑暗出卖灵魂以求永生的恶徒。

trans-unit.source: Izzet Signet
trans-unit.target: 伊捷印记

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{U}{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.target: 伊捷印记的设计经常变化，每次都更接近尼米捷浮华的画像。

trans-unit.source: Lightning Greaves
trans-unit.target: 迅雷护胫

trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有敏捷与帷幕异能。（它不能成为咒语或异能的目标。）佩带{0}

trans-unit.source: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.
trans-unit.target: 闪电击中山崖后，矿石成铁，铁成钢，钢成护胫。迅雷长存其间。

trans-unit.source: "A crafter must imbue her weapon with part of her soul—something the Phyrexians are incapable of doing."\n—Melira
trans-unit.target: 「巧匠打造武器时必定会将心血甚至灵魂灌注其中～这一点非瑞克西亚人永远没法做到。」～梅梨莱

trans-unit.source: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?"\n—Jhoira, master artificer
trans-unit.target: 「法术力是尚无定形的理念，那这无穷的可能性又是什么？」～神器大师尤依拉

trans-unit.target: 此印记之类型与其本身一样重要。若出现在徽章上，配印者便是主人。若刺青在肉体上，背负者即是奴隶。

trans-unit.source: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.
trans-unit.target: 对析米克联合而言，其印记并非荣誉之徽记，而是注册商标。这熟悉图像在任何生体用品上都可见到，证明了为其投资的高超技巧，精妙创意，以及昂贵费用。

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得1点生命。{T}：加{R}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: C15·322 | Zoetic Cavern | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\nMorph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。变身{2}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
trans-unit.target: 里面没有生灵，却有生命。
